text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

The town magazine wants coverage of a local
festival... And one more place...

They're asking for recommendations of
"ALSTROEMERIA's favorite spots."

Yes, yes! For me~, it's here!
I think the game center is great~!
Huh...

Wow, that's a bit surprising.
Even Amana-chan goes to the game center?

Huh~? Is that weird?
Amana goes to lots of places, you know~?
Huh... Tenka...
The book caf√©... is good...

Hehe, even Tenka-chan's
choice is a bit surprising.

They have lots of books... so you can study...
and besides... it's stylish.
(Oh... both of them...)

Hey, in that case...
...Why don't we try both?

Huh... both...? But...
we can only cover one place for the interview...

Yeah. But, maybe we can go check them out first,
and then decide.

I see~... Chiyuki-san, that's amazing!
It's like a preliminary investigation~!

Oh, if that's the case, then I need to
know where Chiyuki-san wants to go too!

Y-Yeah...!
I need to know too...!

Thank you,
Amana-chan, Tenka-chan... But

This time, I think... Amana-chan's and Tenka-chan's
preferred places would be great.
